testimonials.heading: Join 10,000+ People Reflecting with Capsule Note

sarah.quote: Reading my letter one year later was incredibly powerful. I forgot I wrote those goals, and I actually achieved most of them!
sarah.author: Sarah K., Digital Plan

michael.quote: The physical letter to my daughter for her 18th birthday is going to be priceless. This is more than an app—it's a time capsule.
michael.author: Michael T., Paper & Pixels

emma.quote: I use it for gratitude journaling. Getting those letters quarterly reminds me how far I've come. Simple, but life-changing.
emma.author: Emma L., Digital Plan

valueProposition.title: Why Capsule Note?
valueProposition.description: We believe in the power of reflection. Every letter you write is an investment in your future self—a moment of clarity, connection, or celebration delivered exactly when you need it most.

payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.description: Your payment could not be processed. This could be due to insufficient funds, an expired card, or other payment issues. Please check your payment method and try again.

email_not_verified.description: You must verify your email address before your subscription can be activated. Check your inbox for a verification email from Capsule Note.

pending_subscription_not_found.title: Subscription Not Found
pending_subscription_not_found.description: We couldn't find your pending subscription. This might mean it has expired or was already activated. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.

unknown.title: Something Went Wrong
